meanings.definition: The position or term of office of a prime minister.
meanings.sent1: In the premiership, the prime minister makes important decisions for the country.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to hold the premiership and lead the nation.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed the premiership of the house, demanding treats and attention.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work earned him the premiership of the team.
meanings.sent5: The premiership comes with great responsibility and power.

meanings.definition: The office or term of office of a premier.
meanings.sent1: The premiership of the state requires strong leadership skills.
meanings.sent2: During his premiership, many positive changes were implemented.
meanings.sent3: The dog declared himself the premiership of the backyard, guarding it diligently.
meanings.sent4: She fought hard to achieve the premiership of the company.
meanings.sent5: The premiership is a position of authority and influence.

meanings.definition: The status or position of being a premier.
meanings.sent1: Achieving the premiership in the organization is a significant accomplishment.
meanings.sent2: His dedication led to his premiership within the community.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel claimed the premiership of the park, gathering all the nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: She worked tirelessly to reach the premiership in her field.
meanings.sent5: The premiership brings respect and recognition to those who hold it.
